page.title: 07HOME LIFE.
page.content: The home life of the majority of villagers is the traditional English way of life.Most households have a married couple and their children,few have grandparents living with them.Most of the families live on The Elms, a modern coucil estate which is close to the school,Post Office,chapel and the church.Alongside The Elms is a group of Old Peoples Bungalows. The family diet consists of traditional simple foods cooked by the lady of the house. Most of the fresh fare is grown in the gardens with the fish and meat obtained from mobile shops or in nearby towns. Bread and cakes are baked in the village shop. There is an annual village produce show each July which demonstrates that the domestic and gardening skills are still highly valued.
